activities.name: Copy ATB
activities.description: Copy ATB from PaaS to IaaS

properties.description: Copy QAQuestions from QA to Dev

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT 
'ND' as UPDATE_STATUS,
Substring(Mainkey, 1, 6) as MAINKEY,
Substring(Subkey, 1, 7) as SUBKEY,
Substring([Data], 1, 80) as DATAFIELD
From [Configuration]
where [Mainkey] = 'SendToBI'
And substring ([param], 1, 1) = '1'
And [Application]='BACKEND'

properties.description: Copy QAQuestion from QA to DEV
